stories.title: Add comprehensive error logging to report generation endpoint
stories.description: Add try-catch logging to the POST /api/reports/:id/generate endpoint to capture and log all errors for debugging.
acceptanceCriteria: Wrap the entire report generation logic in try-catch block
Log request details: reportId, organization_name, assessment data size
Log each step: Claude API call start, response received, PDF generation start, completion
Catch and log API errors with full error message and response
Catch and log PDF generation errors with stack trace
Return 500 with JSON error message: { error: 'specific error message', timestamp: Date.now() }
Log all errors to console.error for Railway logs visibility
Test by calling endpoint and verifying errors appear in Railway Logs

stories.title: Fix page scroll position on navigation between pages
stories.description: When user navigates between assessment pages or to results page, page should scroll to top automatically instead of staying at bottom of previous page.
acceptanceCriteria: In AssessmentPage component, add window.scrollTo(0, 0) when page changes
In ResultsPage component, add window.scrollTo(0, 0) on component mount
Scroll happens BEFORE page render (use useEffect with [] dependency)
Test: Start assessment, go to page 2 -> should scroll to top
Test: Answer all questions and submit -> results page should start at top
Test on mobile viewport (375px) to ensure it works

stories.title: Fix gauge number clipping at top of results page
stories.description: The risk score number (27, 35, etc) in the circular gauge is getting cut off at the top of the page. Needs CSS overflow fix.
acceptanceCriteria: Find the gauge component CSS (likely .gauge, .gauge-circle, or similar)
Add overflow: visible to parent container if needed
Verify the number text has proper padding/margin (at least 16px top margin)
Check that the entire gauge circle and number are visible without clipping
Test on desktop (1024px) viewport - number should be fully visible
Test on mobile (375px) viewport - number should still be visible and readable
Ensure gauge background color doesn't hide the number

notes: All three stories are high priority. US-041 is critical for debugging.
